title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions: Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This powerful yellow and black kit comes with everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications. The compact and lightweight design of the DCD771 Drill/Driver features a 1/2-inch chuck, ergonomic handle, and 300 UWO motor performance. The DCF885 Impact Driver is 5.55 inches long, weighs 2.8 lbs, and includes a 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips. With 3 LED lights and a 20-second delay, you'll have superior visibility without shadows. This combo kit also includes 2 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger, making it the perfect choice for any project. Get your DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power, performance, and convenience that DEWALT is known for.

The compact and lightweight design of the DCD771 Drill/Driver makes it comfortable to handle, while the DCF885 Impact Driver's 1-handed chuck loading and 1-inch bit tip size ensure quick and efficient use. With 3 LED lights and superior visibility, you'll never miss a spot. Perfect for a wide range of applications, this combo kit is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional. Don't miss out on this incredible deal - get your DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today!
